revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Power Plant |image = [[File:Power Plant.png]] |caption = An overhead map of the Power Plant. |tokens = 1,000 |location = North of Lavender Town. }} The '''Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounters || 13,507 |- | Electabuzz (Boss) || 67,535 |- | Zapdos (Boss) || 101,302 |}
==Pokémon==
* Pikachu * Raichu * Magnemite * Magneton * Grimer * Muk * Electrode * Electabuzz (boss) * Zapdos (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 50% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Incense}} [[Lucky Incense]] || 17% |}
[[Category:Dungeons]]
